params._amountETH: Amount in ETH to be converted
params._ccy: Currency that has to be converted from ETH
Currency that has to be converted to ETH
Currency that has to be converted to ETH

initialize(address).details: Function is invoked by the proxy contract when the contract is added to the ProxyController.

params._owner: The address of the contract owner

returns._0: The boolean if the selected currency is supported or not

linkPriceFeed(bytes32,address,bool).details: This method can use only Chainlink.

params._isEthPriceFeed: Boolean if the price feed is in ETH or not
params._priceFeedAddr: The contract address of Chainlink price feed

returns._0: True if the execution of the operation succeeds

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._isEthPriceFeed: Boolean if the price feed is in ETH or not

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._haircut: Haircut ratio used to calculate in collateral calculations

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._haircut: Haircut ratio used to calculate in collateral calculations

convertFromETH(bytes32,uint256).notice: Gets the converted amount to the selected currency from ETH.

convertToETH(bytes32,int256).notice: Gets the converted amount of currency in ETH.

convertToETH(bytes32,uint256).notice: Gets the converted amount of currency in ETH.

getEthDecimals(bytes32).notice: Get ETH decimal for the selected currency.

getHaircut(bytes32).notice: Gets haircut ratio for the selected currency. Haircut is used in bilateral netting cross-calculation.

getHistoricalETHPrice(bytes32,uint80).notice: Gets the historical price in ETH for the selected currency.

getHistoricalUSDPrice(bytes32,uint80).notice: Gets the historical price in USD for the selected currency.

getLastETHPrice(bytes32).notice: Gets the last price in ETH for the selected currency.

getLastUSDPrice(bytes32).notice: Gets the last price in USD for the selected currency.

getUsdDecimals(bytes32).notice: Gets USD decimal for the selected currency.

isSupportedCcy(bytes32).notice: Gets if the selected currency is supported.

linkPriceFeed(bytes32,address,bool).notice: Links the contract to existing Chainlink price feed.

supportCurrency(bytes32,string,address,u.notice: Adds new currency into the protocol and links with existing ETH price feed of Chainlink.

updateCcyHaircut(bytes32,uint256).notice: Updates the haircut ratio for supported currency

updateCurrencySupport(bytes32,bool).notice: Updates the flag indicating if the currency is supported in the protocol.

userdoc.notice: Implements managing of the supported currencies in the protocol. This contract links new currencies to ETH Chainlink price feeds, without an existing price feed contract owner is not able to add a new currency into the protocol
